description: '''Winford Lindsey''' "'''Wynn'''" '''Stewart''' (June 7, 1934 â€“ July 17, 1985) was an American [[country music]] singer and songwriter. He was one of the progenitors of the [[Bakersfield sound]]. Although not a huge chart success, he was an inspiration to such artists as [[Buck Owens]], [[Merle Haggard]] and [[Nick Lowe]].
